name: Sutherland
pestRiskFactors: Bushland proximity increases spider and possum encounters
Native vegetation attracts termites and other wood-boring pests
Sutherland properties require regular termite inspections due to Sydney's high-risk termite zone classification
localInfo: Sutherland is part of the Sutherland Shire, known as 'The Shire', with a mix of bushland and beaches. The area experiences common Sydney pest issues including termites, cockroaches, and rodents. Regular pest inspections are recommended for all property types in this area.
